name: Sanford C. Bernstein Limited
membership: We are currently a member of the Association for Financial Markets in Europe (AFME).
goal: Sanford C. Bernstein Limited is one of the leading global investment research and institutional brokerage firms not affiliated to an investment bank. We are a subsidiary of AllianceBernstein, a global asset manager, which is majority owned by French insurer, AXA.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market
euInitiatives: MiFID II, MiFIR, AMLD 5 and AMLR
